text-letter1-0: All the conscious years of my childhood were spent in an independent state. Even without understanding what independence is, I heard and knew about it. Comprehension came gradually.
text-letter1-1: I never cease to be proud of the fact that I live in an independent state. On the streets are blue and yellow flags and tridents, which protect and care for freedom, and therefore no enemy is able to destroy them.
You are a part of your land: You are a part of your land
text-letter2-0: Homeland is your homeland, your native home, where your family lived or lives. You feel needed in any corner of your native land.
text-letter2-1: After all, you are loved here and are waiting for you. Here you are understood and you can be yourself. This is very valuable nowadays.
text-letter3-0: A coniferous forest can be seen from the windows of houses located on the outskirts of the city. You will go there and immediately find yourself in the thick shade of trees that emit a fresh aroma. There are also many hills and ravines in our forests, as the terrain here is hilly.
text-letter3-1: Near the forest there are swamps, on the shores of which many wild birds live. There are wonderful lakes in our forests. They are located in the middle of the woods, where my father and I often go to rest and fish. The well-being and happiness of my native land are important to me. This is the most expensive place on Earth.
letters from all over the country: letters from all over the country
A place where your thoughts are read and: A place where your thoughts are read and your wishes come true.
